title: Won 'Hack the web' competition
name: Pruthvi Patel
description: Pruthvi Patel and Harshil Walia won the 'Hack the Web' GDSC NUV website design competition organized by GDSC Navrachana University and powered by Google and Microsoft Student Partner Program. Pruthvi & Harshil bagged the first position out of 10 other teams, and got certificates from Microsoft and also got their website for GDSC NUV be the official website for the club.

title: Won 'Hack the web' competition
name: Harshil Walia
description: Harshil Walia and Pruthvi Patel won the 'Hack the Web' GDSC NUV website design competition organized by GDSC Navrachana University and powered by Google and Microsoft Student Partner Program. Pruthvi & Harshil bagged the first position out of 10 other teams, and got certificates from Microsoft and also got their website for GDSC NUV be the official website for the club.

title: Conducted the GCP Crash Course
name: Perin Shah, Dhvanan Kotecha, & more
description: Successfully conducted a Google Cloud Platform Crash Course, with more than 80 students participating. Students that completed their study track, also got hoodies and schwags form Google.

title: Flutter IO Extended Contest Winners
name: Samarth Shah & More
description: Won the contest at the Flutter IO Extended event, and got schwags from Flutter.
